current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To rescind certain Federal funds identified by States as
		  unwanted and use the funds to reduce the Federal debt.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Returned Exclusively For Unpaid
			 National Debt Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Use of unwanted
			 Federal funds to reduce Federal debt

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Returned Exclusively for Unpaid National Debt Act/s:2/ss:b

text.#text: There is rescinded, from any Federal funds required to be allocated by formula among all States that agree to use such funds for a specified purpose, an amount equal to the amount of such funds that would have otherwise been allocated to a State that identifies such funds under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall only apply if, not later than the last date on which an application or State plan must be submitted in order for a State to be allocated, in an annual or biennial budget cycle, funds described in such subsection—
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Returned Exclusively for Unpaid National Debt Act/s:2/ss:a

text.#text:
the State
			 legislature with jurisdiction over such budget cycle adopts a concurrent
			 resolution identifying the funds as unwanted; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to the agency head responsible for allocation of the funds, in such form and manner and containing such information as the agency head determines appropriate to make the determination in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Returned Exclusively for Unpaid National Debt Act/s:2/ss:b/p:1
Returned Exclusively for Unpaid National Debt Act/s:2/ss:c

text.#text: the State submits notice of the resolution described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall determine and report to the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Returned Exclusively for Unpaid National Debt Act/s:2/ss:b/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: the amount to be rescinded under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Returned Exclusively for Unpaid National Debt Act/s:2/ss:a

text.#text: An agency head that receives notice described in

header.#text:
Determination of
			 amount To be rescinded

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Returned Exclusively for Unpaid National Debt Act/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: in the special fund account “Gifts to Reduce Debt Held by the Public, Bureau of the Public Debt, Treasury” and used to reduce the Federal debt as provided in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 3113(d) of title 31, United States Code

header.#text:
Use for
			 reduction of Federal debt

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: each year a report identifying the amount deposited in the Treasury under
with respect to each State in such year.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Returned Exclusively for Unpaid National Debt Act/s:2/ss:d

term.#tail:
means the head of a department or agency of the

text.#text:
any commonwealth,
			 territory, or possession of the United States.
